name: Level 1 Fighter
description:
An entry for #bitsyjam January 2020 on the theme of "rat". Use the arrow keys to navigate and advance text. Walk into objects and people to interact with them.

Every adventurer starts their career somewhere, and today is your turn! Will you, like so many, start your legend in a basement full of rats? Probably!

This game includes many features from other games you have loved, such as Fallout 3 and Mass Effect 3. Unfortunately, the feature it contains from those games is a slapdash ending due to scheduling conflicts, which we will fix in post following massive customer complaints.

Built in Bitsy by Adam Le Doux, with hacks from the Bitsy Hack Repo maintained by Sean S. LeBlanc.
